content: introducing the easy breezy chunky bun beanie i am so excited for this pattern as i am someone who always wears their hair in a messy bun so not only is this cute and stylish it s also functional for bad hair days and keeping your head warm this pattern is beginner friendly and easily adjustable to make it perfect for you the ribbed texture is simple modern and perfect for the cooler seasons great for bad hair days when you want to wear a ponytail or bun or just because it s cute pattern includes -detailed instructions for 4 sizes child 3-10 yrs teen/adult small adult medium & adult large -photos for reference -adjustment suggestions for custom sizing difficulty easy yarn used bulky 5 weight hook size k / 6 5 mm standard us crochet terms photos above adult medium on head size of 22
